I loved this place during my recent visit to Barcelona!  I even went back a week later to try other menu items!  The staff is so helpful and friendly.  They all were able to assist me in English.  The Mojitos are delicious, as well as the Pisto vegetable dish, the nacho plate, and the chicken fingers.  This place puts their own personal touch on all the options.  After eating mostly ham, bread, and cheese all over Barcelona, I enjoyed a change at Palosanto.  Go enjoy a nice beverage and some tapas here!
